entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
